{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Sagemcom |model=F@ST 3686 |revision=V2.2 (HP) |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |availability=now |est_release_date= |fcc_date=01/02/2018 |fcc_id=VW3FAST3686, VW3FAST3686V2H |type=wireless router, cable modem |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM3384ZU;BROADCOM, QAMLink (R), BCM3384ZUKFSBG, CA1713 P20, 09A-39 N3A1 W; |cpu1_cspeed=1.5 GHz |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX30LF1G18AC-XKI |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4B2G1646F-BCMA |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |serial=yes |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM4360;BCM4360KMLG, TE1701 P20, 401-04 3 W; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=3 |wi2_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi2_chip1_model=BCM43217;BCM43217KMLG, TD1635 P11, 642180-02 1 W; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Broadcom |sw_model=BCM53134S;BCM53134SKFBG,TN1710 P21, 488-12 P3 W; |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=4 |addl_chips=5GHz Front End Module;Skyworks;SKY85712-21;SKY21, 85712, 711WB;3; ,,, Wideband Tuner;Broadcom;BCM3184;P30, 3184LG, TE1716, 046;1; ,,, Wideband Amplifier;NXP;BGU7045;;1; ,,, Dual Channel Ringing SLIC;Zarlink;Le9540;9540DUQC, JA(e3), 1706MBG;1; |flags=DOCSIS 3.0, DFS (master), |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=sc-XXXX, sc-XXXX-5G |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=00:19:70 |oui_eth=00:19:70 }} {{TagLine|802.11ac DOCSIS 3.0 Cable Gateway}} :[http://www.sagemcom.com/broadband/gateways/home-connectivity/fst-3686-ac/ Product page] (AC) {{•}} [http://sagemcom.ru/item_110.htm Product page] (RU)
"FAST3686 SFR_REV.04" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
* DOCSIS 3.0 24x8 channels<!--
